attributes.title: Worst app to support my beloved president
attributes.review: I am an avid supporter of Donald trump 🥰 and all that he stand for ✌️, however I cannot in good faith condone the continued usage of the app❌. Ever since I downloaded the app I’ve gotten nothing but liberal pop up ads 😓and spam to gun control websites 🔫. This must be fixed as I am scared the continued ads will subconsciously change the way I think like all counties other than our glorious America do.

attributes.title: This is AWFUL
attributes.review: Downloaded this app and it’s probably the worst decision I’ve ever made. Nothing works properly. I can’t access anything other than the homepage. This is ridiculous. I thought the president would have enough money to make a decent app but apparently not. How can you make America great again if you can’t even make a good app. Total disappointment.... you’ve lost my vote.

attributes.title: Disgraceful App!
attributes.review: I decided to download this app in support of our noble president, however the second I began to use it it continuously asked for donations so much so that I could not even use the app efficiently because of the constant pop-ups! Eventually I gave in and donated, next thing I know my card information is being used at a McDonald’s in Slovakia!! Took days to get my bank to fix it! DO NOT INSTALL!!

attributes.title: daddy trump i'm disappointed
attributes.review:
now i downloaded the app expecting to see more of a personal instagram of my fav cheeto boi owo uwu xd but instead i think i accidentally came across a fascist regime so i'm a little disappointed in you but i know it was just taken out of context 🥴🤪 now i thought this app would turn in an trump only fans 👉👈🥵 AND THAT IS NOT WHAT HAPPENED AND THAT IS UNACCEPTABLE HOW DO YOU EXPECT TO WIN AN 
ELECTION WITHOUT SUPPORTING YOUR COUNRTYS NEEDS??? anyway hope to see that onlyfans soon 🥺🤨🥴👁👄👁🥵

attributes.title: horrible give this more one stars
attributes.review: I was EXTREMELY excited to use this app but as soon as i opened it the app started glitching, so i closed it but then my phone started glitching. I deleted the app, and my phone kept  glitching for a couple more minutes, but then it finally stopped. I guess that’s what happens when you download an app promoting a racist person who has raped KIDS. Do not support trump.

attributes.title: A scam?
attributes.review: I think this app is not the real deal. It asked for a bunch of my information, even my social security? Days later I get called by my bank and all my my credit cards were maxed out, a loan was taken out, and all my accounts were wiped clean?! Couldn’t have been a coincidence. Aside from all that I keep getting scam calls from China!?! Would NOT recommend to download this app. FAKE NEWS

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: I can’t even begin to describe how horrible this app is. It took a month to load and when it finally downloaded it tried to steal all my information and then it took over my phone and grew legs and arms. After that it kicked my dog off the face of the earth and ate my baby sister. I finally managed to destroy the app after I threw some freshly boiled glizzy on it😄🤣❣️🙂😭🥳🤣😏💀👶🏾😉👶🏾😄💀🤣😁🤭🙁😩😥😫☠️👍🏾😺🤲🏻🎃🤝😺👍🏾👺😽👹🧑🏼👩🏾👀

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD. PORN ADS ALWAYS POP UP
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to support our president and next thing I know there’s porno adds popping up constantly ?? I tried to X them out but for some reason they wouldn’t leave and when I turned my volume off it wouldn’t work!!!! So horrible. Everyone heard a woman having sex with too racist orange men on my phone!!!! so disappointed. this should be a professional app ....

attributes.title: hot garbage
attributes.review: I downloaded this app as a way to see what Trump was doing with his campaign and administration but then it kept asking for me to change my privacy settings and put in my personal information which I am no where near comfortable with doing! This app shouldn’t need my location or my phone number it’s an invasion of my privacy! 0/5 stars this app was good 🦋💕at nothing🦋💕
